item.title: Gadar 2
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: HINDUSTAN JINDA BAAD If ..gadar EK prem katha 2001 was an emotion then #gadar2 2023 is a celebration, being a huge fan of this movie & but ofcourse #SunnyDeol I was not very apprehensive when the sequel to this was announced,a kind of fear was in my mind that it would spoil the name & fame of this 2001 blockbuster & all those associated with it but kudos to the full team & especially the writer #shaktimantalwar the director #AnilSharma & our very own Indian Hulk #tarasingh urf #sunnypaaji

item.title: OMG 2
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: An unhappy civilian asks the court to mandate comprehensive education in schools in a dramatic yet amusing courtroom play.
item.content:encoded:
OMG2 is a brilliant and sensible film on a very important subject . Kudos to Director and Writer Amit Rai for weaving it so brilliantly without being preachy. Congratulations to the whole team specially Suvir Nath , Subash Sahoo Sir for giving us a memorable film .

OMG2 has taken a bold step in bringing out a taboo subject with utmost modesty………. A gripping plot, engaging screenplay, & solid performances #OMG2Review #AkshayKumar is top-notch; #YamiGautam is simply sensational; #PankajTripathi is a great talent.. Guys dont miss it.
